comment: Prof. Allison is great.  Her class is fun.  We did a lot of class exercises and discussions.  Quizzes are easy if you do the reading and take the online practice quiz. Short papers and she tries to give you a variety of topics.  You are allowed 1 page of notes for tests, they are not cumulative.  I would take her class again.

I loved Professor Allison! She was one of the easiest teachers I've had in my college career. 10 quizzes, lowest one is dropped, fairly easy tests, and easy essays. She also give extra credit. She let us bring notes to the test, and I consistently made 90's and a 100 on the final.You actually learn things if you attend. Great teacher!
RACHEL ALLISON! WOMAN OF ACTION! She hated my Galactus diatribes, but she's a great professor. Great taste in cheese.

VERY pretty & helpful. i dont know why the rate below me said you have to write a one page paper before class. not true. her midterm is over the last 3 chapters, in my class anyway. so you dont really have to remember everything in that class. im not fond of soci but she makes it intersting. lots of extra credit & you can bring 1 pg notes for tests

She looks JUST like Katie Holmes! Teaching wise, she is a good teacher. Keeps class interested, gives a lot of extra credit. You can use one page of notes for each exam/mid term. Final you can have endless notes. She does give 10 random quizzes... So make sure you do reading for every class and practice quizzes. I would definitely take her again!

Class is very boring. attendence isnt mandatory but she gives 10 random quizzes. Her essays are 1-2 pages (very easy) and for the test she allows one page of notes, the final essay you get as many pages as you want. Do the work and get an easy A

She is nice. New to KSU. Not sure how experienced she is. She uses filler words "like, umm, right" all the time-Annoying! Reading Summaries-1 full pg paper due every day of class. Huge hard midterm over all the readings & no final. Sometimes activities but beats a topic to a bush. Lectures are off ppt & are boring. Sometimes you leave class early.
